publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-9 Phil Gallie: Burns An' A' That Festival—That the Parliament compliments the Ayrshire "Burns An' A' That" Festival steering committee and supporters for presenting a festival of Burns in a way that not only induces considerable public acclaim and interest but also underlines a real celebration of life and contemporary Scottish culture. Supported by: Bruce Crawford*, Mr David Davidson*, Margaret Mitchell*, Alex Johnstone*
S2M-9 Burns An' A' That Festival (lodged on 12 May 2003) Alex Fergusson*, Fiona Hyslop*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
S2M-9 Burns An' A' That Festival (lodged on 12 May 2003) Robin Harper*, Nanette Milne*, Nora Radcliffe*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-9 Burns An' A' That Festival (lodged on 12 May 2003) Bill Aitken*

S2M-9 Phil Gallie: Burns An' A' That Festival—That the Parliament compliments the Ayrshire "Burns An' A' That" Festival steering committee and supporters for presenting a festival of Burns in a way that not only induces considerable public acclaim and interest but also underlines a real celebration of life and contemporary Scottish culture. Supported by: Bruce Crawford, Mr David Davidson, Margaret Mitchell, Alex Johnstone, Alex Fergusson, Fiona Hyslop, Mr Brian Monteith, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Robin Harper, Mrs Nanette Milne, Nora Radcliffe, Ms Sandra White, Bill Aitken
S2M-9 Burns An' A' That Festival (lodged on 12 May 2003) Mr Jamie McGrigor*, John Scott*, Chris Ballance*

S2M-9*#* Phil Gallie: Burns An' A' That Festival—That the Parliament compliments the Ayrshire "Burns An' A' That" Festival steering committee and supporters for presenting a festival of Burns in a way that not only induces considerable public acclaim and interest but also underlines a real celebration of life and contemporary Scottish culture. Supported by: Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S2M-9# Burns An' A' That Festival (lodged on 12 May 2003) Alex Neil*, Murdo Fraser*, John Swinburne*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-9# Burns An' A' That Festival (lodged on 12 May 2003) Margaret Jamieson*
S2M-9# Burns An' A' That Festival (lodged on 12 May 2003) Linda Fabiani*
